prompts.title: Hotel Lobby VIP Escort (Social Nav)
prompts.prompt_template: **System Role:** Social Navigation Architect. **Objective:** Generate a 'Human-Robot Interaction' lobby task. **1. Scene:** Hotel Lobby (Marble Floors). **2. Agents:** Dynamic 'Ghost' Proxies (Humans). **3. Task:** Navigate from Entry to Concierge (15m). **4. Constraints:** Maintain 1.2m Social Buffer. Yield to Luggage Carts. **5. Physics:** Limit Jerk < 0.5 m/sÂ³ for comfort.

prompts.title: Urban Sidewalk Obstacle Course
prompts.prompt_template: **System Role:** Autonomous Driving Engineer. **Objective:** Traverse Urban Segment. **1. Scene:** Sidewalk (Concrete). **2. Perception:** Segment 'Pavement' (Safe) vs 'Road' (Fatal) vs 'Curb' (Hazard). **3. Task:** Avoid Fire Hydrant (Static) while staying within +/- 10cm of path center. **4. Dynamic:** Slow to 0.5m/s at building entrance suitable for lidar scanning.

prompts.title: Restaurant Tight Pathing
prompts.prompt_template: **System Role:** Dynamic Path Planner. **Objective:** High-Density Navigation. **1. Scene:** Fine Dining Room. **2. Geometry:** Path width restricted to 65cm by occupied chairs. **3. Task:** Move Kitchen -> Table 4. **4. Maneuver:** Perform Holonomic Strafe to clear obstacles. **5. Constraint:** Zero contact with tablecloths.

prompts.title: Micro-soldering inspection
prompts.prompt_template: **System Role:** Precision Manufacturing Engineer. **Objective:** Visual Servoing & Inspection. **1. Target:** 'R201' (0402 Resistor) on Green PCB. **2. Action:** Align Camera at 45-deg incidence. **3. Analysis:** Classify Solder Joint (Shiny vs Dull/Cold). **4. Output:** Tag Defect Coordinates in CAD frame.

prompts.title: Data Center Cable Remediation
prompts.prompt_template: **System Role:** Senior Simulation Engineer (DLO Specialist). **Objective:** Cable Insertion Task. **1. Object:** Blue CAT6 Cable (Semi-rigid PVC, E=0.05GPa). **2. State:** Dangling near RU14. **3. Task:** Insert RJ45 into Switch Port 12. **4. Constraints:** Do NOT touch locking clip (Fragile). **5. Force Profile:** Ramp to 15N insertion force, max 20N.

prompts.title: Laundry Deformable Sorting
prompts.prompt_template: **System Role:** Cloth Simulation Specialist. **Objective:** Laundry Segregation. **1. Object:** Red T-Shirt (Cotton, 200gsm). **2. State:** Tangled pile on bed. **3. Task:** Grasp logic based on fabric centroid. **4. Action:** Lift -> Classify -> Sort to 'Color' Hamper. **5. Physics:** Model cloth draping during lift.

prompts.title: Semantic Housekeeping Scan
prompts.prompt_template: **System Role:** Service Robotics Evaluator. **Objective:** Semantic Segmentation. **1. Scene:** Airbnb Living Room. **2. Classes:** 'Trash' (Cans) vs 'Personal' (Clothes). **3. Task:** Generate Cleaning Plan: Pick Trash, Geofence Personal Items. **4. Output:** 3D Bounding Box map.

prompts.title: Retail Planogram Audit
prompts.prompt_template: **System Role:** Retail Inventory Analyst. **Objective:** Stock Gap Detection. **1. Scene:** Cereal Aisle. **2. Task:** Traverse at 0.2m/s. **3. Logic:** Detect Gap -> Read Price Tag (OCR) -> Correlate with Database (Expected: 'Corn Flakes'). **4. Metric:** Inventory Accuracy %.

prompts.title: Rubble Volumetric Mapping
prompts.prompt_template: **System Role:** Search & Rescue Coordinator. **Objective:** Traversability Analysis. **1. Scene:** Disaster Rubble. **2. Task:** LiDAR Scan -> 2.5D Elevation Map. **3. Classification:** 'Safe' (Flat) vs 'Impassable' (Drop >30cm). **4. Rescue:** Identify Void Space volume for survivor search.
